name: Kingdoms of Mistvallia
description:
Kingdoms of Mistvallia is an accessible Real time strategy game, that can give new and old players a new entry into the genre. Build your base, recruit your army, and dominate the competition.

Real Time Strategy

The players will start with their chosen factions Main building, here they must build there units and base to be able to defend themselves and attack their opponents.

Features:

  • 4 Factions
  • 9 Maps
  • Multiplayer
  • Skirmish mode

Early Access Roadmap:

  • Campaign
  • 16 Additional Maps
  • New units for each faction with Strengths and weaknesses
  • New buildings for each Faction

Multiplayer:

Multiplayer functionality is achieved by one user hosting a match and giving the users they wish to join their public IP this will allow them to connect and play together.

If you would like to follow the continued development of the game you can by finding us on Facebook and Instagram

There are still bugs so if you catch one Contact us on crazyhaggisproductions@gmail.com with a detailed description we will continue to iron out bugs throughout releases.
